text: A kamaghɨn Ahas mɨkɨmasa Aisaia mɨkeme, “Nɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨn God, an azaraghtɨ, an ababanir arazitam akagh. Nɨ ababanir manatamɨn gansɨ ifongegh an azaragh. Egh nɨ, Gumazamizir Oveaghuezibar Nguibamɨn ababanir tamɨn ganasa, o ababanir overiamɨn ikegha izir ababanir tam, o danganir nɨ ifongezir manam, nɨ puram azaraghtɨ God nɨn akagham.”
